text:
Itni ladaiyon ke baad bhi hum itne kareebi dost bane rahe humesha...beech me hairaani hoti thi...par ab vishwaas ho gaya hai ki hum lambi race ke ghode hai (keeping it respectable XD) 
P.S. jab tu mujhe dance videos bhejta hai daalne se pehle ki bata kaisi lag rahi hai to bahut acha lagta hai
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
Patle wale chachu ka memoir:
“Wo aise hi bol rha tha ...main nahi keh rha tujhe bura nahi lagna chaiye…par uska intention nahi tha...humdono aise hi karte hai baat” 
Aise baat karte karte hi dosti shuru hui aur aise baat karte karte hi gehri ho gayi, shayad sabse gehri
Yeh dosti shabdon ki mohtaj nahi hai, bss ek ehsaas hai
P.S. Tu bura nahi naachta..phir bol rha hu..maan na hai to maan varna maa chuda
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
Rawat, OG group ka avid The Hindu reader. Avid ka matlab- “jaa google karle”
Tu kehta hai humne akele me kabhi time nahi bitaya, main kahungi ki meir khuskismati hai wo XD. Mazak kar rha hu. Kabhi tere saath akele time nahi bitaya, par teri presence ne kabhi akela feel bhi nahi hone diya D club me. Main slow sikhta tha cheezein humesha aur tujhse 10 baar puchta tha aur tu 10 baar poora batake saath karta tha. I always appreciated that gesture bro. Shayad isi vajah se tujhe jitni club ki zaroorat thi usse kahi zyada zaroorat club ko tere jaise coordinator ki thi. Tujhe aur Aakarsh ko saath naachte hue dekhkar dil ko jo Sukoon milta tha wo kya hi batau. Teri school ki wild stories aur comments ne kabhi group hangouts ko boring nahi hone diya. Pichle ek saal me jo tera dedciation dikha hai, hats off bhai!!. Gorakhpur ka sabse bada aadmi banega tu ek din(ironical tere petite figure ho dekh ke, par banega). <3 
P.S. Campus aa jata bsdk!!
author: Gavish  Jain

text: Tere sang beetein har lamhe pe humko naaz hai
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
And I will hold
I'll hold onto you
No matter what this world'll throw
It won't shake me loose

I'll reach my hands out in the dark
And wait for yours to interlock
I'll wait for you
I'll wait for you
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
Mile dekho aise hai hum
ke do sur ho jaise madham
koi jyada na koi kaam
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
Jab Koi Baat Bigad Jaaye

Jab Koi Mushkil Pad Jaaye

Tum Dena Saath Mera

O Humnawaa
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
All alone in my room
Waiting for your phone call to come soon
And for you, oh, I would walk a thousand miles
To be in your arms,
Holding my heart
Oh I, Oh I
I love you
And everythings gonna be alright
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
“Oh, for you I would have done whatever 
and I just can't believe we ain't together” - Justice Beaver

First year me wing aur bhaiyon ke saath jyada hangout nahi kiya par ye zarur realize kiya ki you are the glue that holds the Mitul ki family together(and I was not wrong).
Second year se jab bhi kisi course me gand phat ti thi sabse pehle tujhe call karta tha kyonki tere pas humesha kuch na kuch solution hota tha(MSE 201 me literally tha XD). 
Second year me you left no stone unturned to prove ki“non-circuital” branch me hote hue bhi, tum andha chaap sakte ho ( chaapu word chota hai tere liye vaise to). 
You became the real MSE Gawd mere liye to usi din jab tune day 1 phoda. You have always inspired me and many others to work hard no matter the odds and stakes. (ye sach hai Ananya se puch lena proof ke liye XD).
Par ye smile se bhi log itna inspire ho jaate hai ye fourth year me pata chala :P
By making Perfectenschlags you made sure that “the melody of our friendship” will never end. Hum teeno ki bonding ne shayad mujhe bhulwa diya ki wo group mujhe galiyane ke liye banaya gaya tha XD. Par ab main keh sakta hu, I don’t mind losing on those brownie points.
I will be forever indebted to you for hearing out and solving all my trivial doubts and not judging me for them. (Itna bhaari word zaruri tha yaha) 
Bangalore me chaapna to tune already shuru kar diya hai XD (I’ll take some credits here:P)
From one acha aadmi of Perfectenschlags to another.
P.S. I couldn’t have asked for a better Joey to my Chandler <3
author: Gavish  Jain

text: Bhai kuch bhi progress hota tha manager ke kaam ke time pe sabse pehle tujhe batane aata tha. Pata nahi charm hi alag hai tera, tujhe dekh ke hi din ban jaata hai bas. Agar core team me saath hote sahi me maza bahut aata kaam karke tere saath. Antaragni ko tere jaisa hi festie chaiye tha bhai. Kaash teri Antaragni dekh pate. Try karenge bro milne ka humesha. Take care!
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
Sabse pehle to sorry us din ke mazak ke liye bhai XD. Hum pichle 2 semesters me kaafi ache dost ban gaye. Main tujhe kisi bhi course me kuch hota tha to saari update dene ke liye ainvayi phone kar deta tha. Mehfil jamani to sikh hi li pichle lockdown me humne. Ye Schrute Gang ke hangouts to humesha chalte rahenge and our bond will only get stronger. Also thank you for bringing my F1 craze back :P
P.S Hamilton ki mkb!!
author: Gavish  Jain

text: Bhai tera jaisa saaf dil waala insaan nahi dekha maine IITK me. I mean it from the bottom of my heart. Tera har nazariyan, teri har baat logon ke chehre pe khushi laa deti hai. Kya ulti seedhi cheezein try karte rehte the hum saath me breaking me, mere se kuch hota nahi tha par maza bahut aata tha. I hope phirse karne ka mauka milega. Tera jaise right mindset aur spirit wale log bahut zaruri hai D club me. Main agar kabhi bacho se mila to unhe yahi bolunga ki Bhavay jaisi spirit rakho humesha dance ke liye. Thank you for being the part of my life , baaki hum to milte rahenge<3
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
Us raat dodger sikhte hue laga tha kahi ka kahi ki shayad phir milenge aur dekho kya hi mile. Tu life me un kuch logon me se hai jiske saath main akele bhi time spend karu to bore nahi hota. Aaj bhi regret hota hai ki coordi kyon nahi bana tere saath, tere hisse ki thodi galiyan main bhi le leta bachon se. First year se same hood me hai aur ab to neighbourhood me bhi aana  jaana laga rahega XD
To more fuckups and more secrets!!
P.S. SATYA bolu to 304 me kabhi kuch adhoora laga hi nahi kyonki captain and his team always had each other covered.
author: Gavish  Jain

text: Shaadi teri usi se hogi. Gaadi sahi chalata hai tu XD
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
Bas 3 cheezein bolunga jo shayad tu mere alava kisi aur se nahi sun payega ya kam suna hoga:
Tujhse acha president nahi mil sakta tha IITK ko
Teri shaadi usse hi hogi
Tu gaadi sahi chalata hai

Baaki jo nahi bolta ya bol deta hu wo tu sun hi leta hai
author: Gavish  Jain

text:
You are the only person IITK who doesn't need ambient stage conditions to create the hype (fire emoji).
P.S. Amanat sambhal ke rakhna, dost!!
author: Gavish  Jain
